parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether the unit is a [[captive]]. If the unit is a vehicle, its commander is checked instead.<br>
If a unit's captivity level was set as a [[Boolean]], then the returned number is either 0 (for [[false]]) or 1 (for [[true]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[captiveNum]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - anything from 0 to value set by [[setCaptive]] alt syntax. A non zero value means [[captive]].

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_captivity = [[captiveNum]] _unit;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[setCaptive]] 1024;
[[hint]] [[str]] [[captive]] _unit; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>true</value></part></template>
[[hint]] [[str]] [[captiveNum]] _unit; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>1024</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[captive]], [[setCaptive]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
